label: A_mC12_5_3c-001
title: $A19$ Po Structure ({\em Obsolete})
comments:
This was the original determination of the structure of Po, given the {\em Strukturbericht} designation $A19$ by (Gottfried, 1938, 4-5). Eventually it was found that the sample used here was a mixture of \href{current_web_home_dir/A_cP1_221_a-001}{$\alpha$-Po ($A_h$)} and \href{current_web_home_dir/A_hR1_166_a-001}{$\beta$-Po ($A_i$)} (Donohue, 1982, 390). We retain the $A19$ page for historical interest. 
 The ICSD entry uses polonium coordinates that are slightly different from the ones we use.  Both sets are published in (Rollier, 1936).
